name: Fill in the Blanks
description: Text with missing words to fill in. Ideal for vocabulary practice, process steps, and formula practice.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title and an array of exercises, each containing text with *blank* markers and optional hints.

exercises.text: string - Text with *blank* words marked by asterisks. Use *word/alternative* for multiple accepted answers.
exercises.blanks: array of strings - The correct words for the blanks (for reference)
exercises.hint: string - Optional hint for the exercise

exercises.text: Plants use *sunlight/solar energy* and *water* to perform photosynthesis.
exercises.hint: Think about what plants need from their environment

exercises.text: The *chloroplast* is the organelle where photosynthesis takes place, using a pigment called *chlorophyll*.
exercises.hint: Both words start with 'chloro' meaning green

exercises.text: Photosynthesis produces *glucose/sugar* and releases *oxygen/O2* into the atmosphere.
exercises.hint: Think about what comes OUT of photosynthesis

h5p_params_format.text:
Plants use *sunlight/solar energy* and *water* to perform photosynthesis.

The *chloroplast* is the organelle where photosynthesis takes place, using a pigment called *chlorophyll*.

Photosynthesis produces *glucose/sugar* and releases *oxygen/O2* into the atmosphere.

conversion_notes.blank_syntax: Use *word* to mark blanks in text - H5P uses the same asterisk format
conversion_notes.alternative_answers: Use *answer1/answer2* for multiple accepted answers (slash separated)
conversion_notes.exercises_combined: All exercises are joined into one text block with newlines
